# This Python 3 environment comes with many helpful analytics libraries installed
# It is defined by the kaggle/python Docker image: https://github.com/kaggle/docker-python
# For example, here's several helpful packages to load

import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)
from IPython.display import HTML
from base64 import b64encode

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

# You can write up to 20GB to the current directory (/kaggle/working/) that gets preserved as output when you create a version using "Save & Run All" 
# You can also write temporary files to /kaggle/temp/, but they won't be saved outside of the current session
source.3c23b273:
extraPointsGB2018 = pd.read_csv('../input/green-bay-packers-special-play-2018-to-2020/GB_ExtraPoint_2018.csv')
extraPointsGB2019 = pd.read_csv('../input/green-bay-packers-special-play-2018-to-2020/GB_ExtraPoint_2019.csv')
extraPointsGB2020 = pd.read_csv('../input/green-bay-packers-special-play-2018-to-2020/GB_ExtraPoint_2020.csv')

fieldGoalsGB2018 = pd.read_csv('../input/green-bay-packers-special-play-2018-to-2020/GB_FiledGoals_2018.csv')
fieldGoalsGB2019 = pd.read_csv('../input/green-bay-packers-special-play-2018-to-2020/GB_FiledGoals_2019.csv')
fieldGoalsGB2020 = pd.read_csv('../input/green-bay-packers-special-play-2018-to-2020/GB_FiledGoals_2020.csv')

kickoffsGB2018 = pd.read_csv('../input/green-bay-packers-special-play-2018-to-2020/GB_Kickoffs_2018.csv')
kickoffsGB2019 = pd.read_csv('../input/green-bay-packers-special-play-2018-to-2020/GB_Kickoffs_2019.csv')
kickoffsGB2020 = pd.read_csv('../input/green-bay-packers-special-play-2018-to-2020/GB_Kickoffs_2020.csv')

puntsGB2018 = pd.read_csv('../input/green-bay-packers-special-play-2018-to-2020/GB_Punts_2018.csv')
puntsGB2019 = pd.read_csv('../input/green-bay-packers-special-play-2018-to-2020/GB_Punts_2019.csv')
puntsGB2020 = pd.read_csv('../input/green-bay-packers-special-play-2018-to-2020/GB_Punts_2020.csv')

pFFData = pd.read_csv('../input/nfl-big-data-bowl-2022/PFFScoutingData.csv')
pd.options.display.max_rows = 99999999
source.63cd7a5c:
GBKickoffReturn2018Above25Yards = kickoffsGB2018[(kickoffsGB2018.Result == 'Kickoff - Return') & (kickoffsGB2018.kickReturnYardage > 25) & (kickoffsGB2018.playResult > 0)]
GBKickoffReturn2019Above25Yards = kickoffsGB2019[(kickoffsGB2019.Result == 'Kickoff - Return') & (kickoffsGB2019.kickReturnYardage > 25) & (kickoffsGB2019.playResult > 0)]
GBKickoffReturn2020Above25Yards = kickoffsGB2020[(kickoffsGB2020.Result == 'Kickoff - Return') & (kickoffsGB2020.kickReturnYardage > 25) & (kickoffsGB2020.playResult > 0)]

GBKickoffReturn2018Below25Yards = kickoffsGB2018[(kickoffsGB2018.Result == 'Kickoff - Return') & (kickoffsGB2018.kickReturnYardage <= 25)]
GBKickoffReturn2019Below25Yards = kickoffsGB2019[(kickoffsGB2019.Result == 'Kickoff - Return') & (kickoffsGB2019.kickReturnYardage <= 25)]
GBKickoffReturn2020Below25Yards = kickoffsGB2020[(kickoffsGB2020.Result == 'Kickoff - Return') & (kickoffsGB2020.kickReturnYardage <= 25)]

GBKickoffReturn2018LossYards = kickoffsGB2018[(kickoffsGB2018.Result == 'Kickoff - Return') & (kickoffsGB2018.playResult < 0)]
GBKickoffReturn2019LossYards = kickoffsGB2019[(kickoffsGB2019.Result == 'Kickoff - Return') & (kickoffsGB2019.playResult < 0)]
GBKickoffReturn2020LossYards = kickoffsGB2020[(kickoffsGB2020.Result == 'Kickoff - Return') & (kickoffsGB2020.playResult < 0)]
source.38f8383e:
# Merged Data with Kickoff Return Above 25 Yards.
mergedGBKickoffReturn2018Above25Yards = pd.merge(GBKickoffReturn2018Above25Yards, 
                                                 pFFData,  
                                                 how='left', 
                                                 left_on=['gameId','playId'], 
                                                 right_on = ['gameId','playId']
                                                )

mergedGBKickoffReturn2019Above25Yards = pd.merge(GBKickoffReturn2019Above25Yards, 
                                                 pFFData,  
                                                 how='left', 
                                                 left_on=['gameId','playId'], 
                                                 right_on = ['gameId','playId']
                                                )

mergedGBKickoffReturn2020Above25Yards = pd.merge(GBKickoffReturn2020Above25Yards, 
                                                 pFFData,  
                                                 how='left', 
                                                 left_on=['gameId','playId'], 
                                                 right_on = ['gameId','playId']
                                                )

# Merged Data with Kickoff Return Below 25 Yards.
mergedGBKickoffReturn2018Below25Yards = pd.merge(GBKickoffReturn2018Below25Yards, 
                                                 pFFData,  
                                                 how='left', 
                                                 left_on=['gameId','playId'], 
                                                 right_on = ['gameId','playId']
                                                )

mergedGBKickoffReturn2019Below25Yards = pd.merge(GBKickoffReturn2019Below25Yards, 
                                                 pFFData,  
                                                 how='left', 
                                                 left_on=['gameId','playId'], 
                                                 right_on = ['gameId','playId']
                                                )

mergedGBKickoffReturn2020Below25Yards = pd.merge(GBKickoffReturn2020Below25Yards, 
                                                 pFFData,  
                                                 how='left', 
                                                 left_on=['gameId','playId'], 
                                                 right_on = ['gameId','playId']
                                                )

# Merged Data with Kickoff Return Lossing Yards.
mergedGBKickoffReturn2018LossYards = pd.merge(GBKickoffReturn2018LossYards, 
                                                 pFFData,  
                                                 how='left', 
                                                 left_on=['gameId','playId'], 
                                                 right_on = ['gameId','playId']
                                                )

mergedGBKickoffReturn2019LossYards = pd.merge(GBKickoffReturn2019LossYards, 
                                                 pFFData,  
                                                 how='left', 
                                                 left_on=['gameId','playId'], 
                                                 right_on = ['gameId','playId']
                                                )

mergedGBKickoffReturn2020LossYards = pd.merge(GBKickoffReturn2020LossYards, 
                                                 pFFData,  
                                                 how='left', 
                                                 left_on=['gameId','playId'], 
                                                 right_on = ['gameId','playId']
                                                )
source.5cd47bf0:
# Above 25 Yards 2018
GBKickoffReturn2018Above25YardsSeries = GBKickoffReturn2018Above25Yards.groupby(['season','possessionTeam','gameId','playId','quarter','down','yardsToGo','yardlineSide','Result','gameClock',
                                   'yardlineNumber','kickReturnYardage','playResult','preSnapHomeScore','preSnapVisitorScore','event','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr',
                                   'week'],as_index=True).size()
GBKickoffReturn2018Above25YardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(GBKickoffReturn2018Above25YardsSeries)

mergedGBKickoffReturn2018Above25YardsSeries = mergedGBKickoffReturn2018Above25Yards.groupby(
    ['season','kickoffReturnFormation','tackler','gameId','playId','returnDirectionIntended',
     'returnDirectionActual','kickReturnYardage','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr','week'],as_index=True).size()
mergedGBKickoffReturn2018Above25YardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(mergedGBKickoffReturn2018Above25YardsSeries)

# Above 25 Yards 2019
GBKickoffReturn2019Above25YardsSeries = GBKickoffReturn2019Above25Yards.groupby(['season','possessionTeam','gameId','playId','quarter','down','yardsToGo','yardlineSide','Result','gameClock',
                                   'yardlineNumber','kickReturnYardage','playResult','preSnapHomeScore','preSnapVisitorScore','event','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr',
                                   'week'],as_index=True).size()
GBKickoffReturn2019Above25YardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(GBKickoffReturn2019Above25YardsSeries)

mergedGBKickoffReturn2019Above25YardsSeries = mergedGBKickoffReturn2019Above25Yards.groupby(
    ['season','kickoffReturnFormation','tackler','gameId','playId','returnDirectionIntended',
     'returnDirectionActual','kickReturnYardage','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr','week'],as_index=True).size()
mergedGBKickoffReturn2019Above25YardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(mergedGBKickoffReturn2019Above25YardsSeries)

# Above 25 Yards 2020
GBKickoffReturn2020Above25YardsSeries = GBKickoffReturn2020Above25Yards.groupby(['season','possessionTeam','gameId','playId','quarter','down','yardsToGo','yardlineSide','Result','gameClock',
                                   'yardlineNumber','kickReturnYardage','playResult','preSnapHomeScore','preSnapVisitorScore','event','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr',
                                   'week'],as_index=True).size()
GBKickoffReturn2020Above25YardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(GBKickoffReturn2020Above25YardsSeries)

mergedGBKickoffReturn2020Above25YardsSeries = mergedGBKickoffReturn2020Above25Yards.groupby(
    ['season','kickoffReturnFormation','tackler','gameId','playId','returnDirectionIntended',
     'returnDirectionActual','kickReturnYardage','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr','week'],as_index=True).size()
mergedGBKickoffReturn2020Above25YardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(mergedGBKickoffReturn2020Above25YardsSeries)

# Below 25 Yards 2018
GBKickoffReturn2018Below25YardsSeries = GBKickoffReturn2018Below25Yards.groupby(['season','possessionTeam','gameId','playId','quarter','down','yardsToGo','yardlineSide','Result','gameClock',
                                   'yardlineNumber','kickReturnYardage','playResult','preSnapHomeScore','preSnapVisitorScore','event','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr',
                                   'week'],as_index=True).size()
GBKickoffReturn2018Below25YardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(GBKickoffReturn2018Below25YardsSeries)

mergedGBKickoffReturn2018Below25YardsSeries = mergedGBKickoffReturn2018Below25Yards.groupby(
    ['season','kickoffReturnFormation','tackler','gameId','playId','returnDirectionIntended',
     'returnDirectionActual','kickReturnYardage','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr','week'],as_index=True).size()
mergedGBKickoffReturn2018Below25YardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(mergedGBKickoffReturn2018Below25YardsSeries)

# Below 25 Yards 2019
GBKickoffReturn2019Below25YardsSeries = GBKickoffReturn2019Below25Yards.groupby(['season','possessionTeam','gameId','playId','quarter','down','yardsToGo','yardlineSide','Result','gameClock',
                                   'yardlineNumber','kickReturnYardage','playResult','preSnapHomeScore','preSnapVisitorScore','event','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr',
                                   'week'],as_index=True).size()
GBKickoffReturn2019Below25YardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(GBKickoffReturn2019Below25YardsSeries)

mergedGBKickoffReturn2019Below25YardsSeries = mergedGBKickoffReturn2019Below25Yards.groupby(
    ['season','kickoffReturnFormation','tackler','gameId','playId','returnDirectionIntended',
     'returnDirectionActual','kickReturnYardage','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr','week'],as_index=True).size()
mergedGBKickoffReturn2019Below25YardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(mergedGBKickoffReturn2019Below25YardsSeries)

# Below 25 Yards 2020
GBKickoffReturn2020Below25YardsSeries = GBKickoffReturn2020Below25Yards.groupby(['season','possessionTeam','gameId','playId','quarter','down','yardsToGo','yardlineSide','Result','gameClock',
                                   'yardlineNumber','kickReturnYardage','playResult','preSnapHomeScore','preSnapVisitorScore','event','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr',
                                   'week'],as_index=True).size()
GBKickoffReturn2020Below25YardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(GBKickoffReturn2020Below25YardsSeries)

mergedGBKickoffReturn2020Below25YardsSeries = mergedGBKickoffReturn2020Below25Yards.groupby(
    ['season','kickoffReturnFormation','tackler','gameId','playId','returnDirectionIntended',
     'returnDirectionActual','kickReturnYardage','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr','week'],as_index=True).size()
mergedGBKickoffReturn2020Below25YardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(mergedGBKickoffReturn2020Below25YardsSeries)

# Loosing Yards 2018
GBKickoffReturn2018LossYardsSeries = GBKickoffReturn2018LossYards.groupby(['season','possessionTeam','gameId','playId','quarter','down','yardsToGo','yardlineSide','Result','gameClock',
                                   'yardlineNumber','kickReturnYardage','playResult','preSnapHomeScore','preSnapVisitorScore','event','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr',
                                   'week'],as_index=True).size()
GBKickoffReturn2018LossYardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(GBKickoffReturn2018LossYardsSeries)

mergedGBKickoffReturn2018LossYardsSeires = mergedGBKickoffReturn2018LossYards.groupby(
    ['season','kickoffReturnFormation','specialTeamsSafeties','gameId','playId','returnDirectionIntended',
     'returnDirectionActual','kickReturnYardage','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr','week'],as_index=True).size()
mergedGBKickoffReturn2018LossYardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(mergedGBKickoffReturn2018LossYardsSeires)

# Loosing Yards 2019
GBKickoffReturn2019LossYardsSeries = GBKickoffReturn2019LossYards.groupby(['season','possessionTeam','gameId','playId','quarter','down','yardsToGo','yardlineSide','Result','gameClock',
                                   'yardlineNumber','kickReturnYardage','playResult','preSnapHomeScore','preSnapVisitorScore','event','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr',
                                   'week'],as_index=True).size()
GBKickoffReturn2019LossYardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(GBKickoffReturn2019LossYardsSeries)

mergedGBKickoffReturn2019LossYardsSeires = mergedGBKickoffReturn2019LossYards.groupby(
    ['season','kickoffReturnFormation','specialTeamsSafeties','gameId','playId','returnDirectionIntended',
     'returnDirectionActual','kickReturnYardage','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr','week'],as_index=True).size()
mergedGBKickoffReturn2019LossYardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(mergedGBKickoffReturn2019LossYardsSeires)

# Loosing Yards 2020
GBKickoffReturn2020LossYardsSeries = GBKickoffReturn2020LossYards.groupby(['season','possessionTeam','gameId','playId','quarter','down','yardsToGo','yardlineSide','Result','gameClock',
                                   'yardlineNumber','kickReturnYardage','playResult','preSnapHomeScore','preSnapVisitorScore','event','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr',
                                   'week'],as_index=True).size()
GBKickoffReturn2020LossYardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(GBKickoffReturn2020LossYardsSeries)

mergedGBKickoffReturn2020LossYardsSeires = mergedGBKickoffReturn2020LossYards.groupby(
    ['season','kickoffReturnFormation','specialTeamsSafeties','gameId','playId','returnDirectionIntended',
     'returnDirectionActual','kickReturnYardage','homeTeamAbbr','visitorTeamAbbr','week'],as_index=True).size()
mergedGBKickoffReturn2020LossYardsFrame = pd.DataFrame(mergedGBKickoffReturn2020LossYardsSeires)

source.a0ba43c0: # Data Preparation for Kick of Return
